value.name: Bay Area police shooting videos follow same recipe; critics call it ‘slick marketing’
value.description: The videos showing what police euphemistically call “officer-involved shootings” follow the same formula: a 3-D map of the scene, 911 dispatch tapes and text set up a narrative before viewers see selected body cam footage.

video.name: Bay Area police shooting videos follow same recipe; critics call it ‘slick marketing’

value.name: Fourth stimulus check: Congressional support grows for new direct payment
value.description: More money coming? A powerful congressional committee is calling for additional rounds of economic relief for families still struggling.

value.name: Burger King debuting Ch’King chicken sandwich nationwide: ‘Our greatest yet’
value.description: Burger King’s newest chicken sandwich — the hand-breaded Ch’King — will be available at restaurants nationwide.
